name: BirthdayPresentation
0:
”Alexa, open birthday presentation”
”Alexa, start birthday presentation”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: birthday presentation
des: Using your Smart Home Alexa, you can present this poem to a friend, family member, on anyone who has a birthday on that day. it is a poem about someone's birthday. You can be for anyone at any age. It is funny, fun to use, and you don't have to do all the work to make a poem. Hope you enjoy it!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
